pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Clear Skin and Acne Control Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Acne Control Kit offers 3 steps to clear skin.

The Thursday Plantation 3 step skincare routine is tailored to keep skin clear & healthy-looking. The entire range is formulated with 100% Pure Tea Tree Oil, a natural antibacterial that targets pimples, blemishes, blackheads & whiteheads.

Step 1: Cleanse.
Tea Tree Face Wash for Acne.- Tea Tree Face Wash for Acne deep cleans without over-drying the skin.
- The natural soap free, foaming cleanser, helps prevent acne and pimples by gently cleansing the skin to remove the build up of excessive oils.
- Contains 100% pure Australian Tea Tree Oil to help control bacteria and Chamomile extract to soothe the skin, helping to keep skin clear.

Step 2: Target.
Tea Tree Medicated Gel for Acne.
- Contains Tea Tree Oil, a natural antibacterial agent which penetrates into the skin helping to dry out pimples and acne.
- Ideal for whiteheads, blackheads, pimples and acne. 
- Penetrates into the skin to dissolve blackheads and whiteheads.
- Concentrated formula to dry out pimples.
- Contains 100% pure Australian Tea Tree Oil, a natural antibacterial ingredient to help control acne.

Step 3: Hydrate.
Tea Tree Face Cream.
- This light weight Face Cream combines the antibacterial power of Tea Tree Oil with natural, skin loving ingredients to moisturise and maintain clear skin, naturally.
- Hydrates skin without clogging pores.
- Restores the skin's natural moisture balance after cleansing and toning.
- Contains a balanced blend of natural moisturisers including Macadamia Oil, Rosehip Oil and Shea Butter to restore the skin.

Boxed Contents: 1 x Tea Tree Face Wash for Acne 150mL, 1 x Tea Tree Medicated Gel for Acne 25g, 1 x Tea Tree Face Cream with Rosehip & Vitamin E 65g.

Size: 150mL + 25g + 65g

Dermatologist Tested?: Yes

Skin Type: Combination| Dry| Normal| Oily

Skin Condition: Breakouts

Warnings

All Products: For external use only. It is recommended you skin patch test prior to use. Discontinue use if sensitivity occurs. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not apply to broken skin. Keep out of reach of children.
Tea Tree Medicated Gel for Acne - Only: Do not use if foil seal at mouth of tube is broken. Contains Alcohol.

Ingredients

Tea Tree Face Wash for Acne: Water, Coco-Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Alcohol, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Sodium Hydroxymethylglycinate, Eucalyptus Citriodor Oil, Limonene.
Tea Tree Face Cream: Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetearyl Olivate, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Phenoxyethanol, Capryly Glycol, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Xanthan Gum, Allantoin, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Limonene, Linalool.

Active Ingredients: Tea Tree Medicated Gel for Acne: Active Ingredient Melaleuca Oil 200mg/g.

Directions

Tea Tree Face Wash for Acne: Wet face and gently massage into the skin, avoiding the eyes. Rinse well and pat dry. Tea Tree Medicated Gel for Acne: Cleanse skin thoroughly. Gently apply a small amount to affected areas morning and night. Tea Tree Face Cream: Gently massage into skin on the face & neck areas.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Please recycle cardboard.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
